Text:
Hi can you help me i'm ok with wbfs files but what do i need to do to either change these files to wbfs or transfer them onto a disc bearing in mind my laptop won't let me do anything over 4gb.
Any help would be apreciated.
Thanks.
P.s I currently use a hard drive to play my games if that helps in any way.

@jimmy99x,  your games hdd id in fat32, you need NTFS if you want files over 4gb, format with this: http://www.partition-tool.com/resource/convert-fat32-in-windows-xp-and-vista.htm  (tutorial dont download anything)
